# 02 Load KITTI for Training

``` python
ds = o3d.ml.datasets.KITTI(KITTI_ROOT)
```

``` python
num = "000000"
label = KITTI_ROOT/"training"/"label_2"/(num+".txt")
calib = ds.read_calib(KITTI_ROOT/"training"/"calib"/(num+".txt"))
ds.read_label(label, calib)
```
